title: LAIR / INSTIGATOR
description:
You are caught in the ray of the Pale Compressor and talk to Ruby. You can:
1. Ask about the Compressor.
2. Ask about the murder and why Ruby went into hiding.
3. Try to destroy the Compressor.
4. Try to stop Ruby from killing herself if you destroy the Compressor.
5. Let Ruby go.

dialogueTree.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "Suddenly, your entire body is paral..."
dialogueTree.text: Suddenly, your entire body is paralysed. Aggressive white noise fills your skull -- a strange pain like you've never felt before. Through the static, you hear a woman's voice.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "It's like a thousand radio stations..."
links.text: It's like a thousand radio stations are being blasted into your head all at once, but her words are the only ones you can make out.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I know you're feeling pretty uncom..."
links.text: "I know you're feeling pretty uncomfortable right now. Don't move too much or fight it. That'll just make it worse," says the shadowy figure by the machine.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Can't say it's a pleasure, officer..."
links.text: "Can't say it's a pleasure, officer. I was really hoping *not* to make your acquaintance. But -- here we are. "

links.title: Suggestion: "The voice coming through the whirlw..."
links.text: The voice coming through the whirlwind of pain is not malicious. She doesn't want to hurt you -- but she has to.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Doesn't wish to hurt you? Not accor..."
links.text: Doesn't wish to hurt you? Not according to your ear canals... wait, no, not even your ear canals -- this is going directly into your neural pathways.

links.title: You: "Cover your ears!"
links.text: Cover your ears!

links.title: Pain Threshold: "No, buddy, that's not going to help..."
links.text: No, buddy, that's not going to help. You can't shield yourself from this -- it's an entirely *new* type of experience. Way worse than all the previous ones.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Take out all the good parts of pyrh..."
links.text: Take out all the good parts of pyrholidon, leave all the bad parts, and make a brain-bomb. In a constant state of exploding. That's this.

links.title: You: "Don't cover them."
links.text: Don't cover them.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "That's an awful decision. Why would..."
links.text: That's an awful decision. Why would you not want to shield yourself from it? It's an entirely *new* type of experience -- way worse than all the previous ones.

links.title: Volition: "Don't focus on the pain -- focus on..."
links.text: Don't focus on the pain -- focus on doing your job. Tell her she's under arrest.

links.title: You: "(Yell through the static.) "You're..."
links.text: (Yell through the static.) "You're under arrest!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Really now? Check this out!" She t..."
links.text: "Really now? Check this out!" She turns the dial in her hand.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "You're overwhelmed with a new surge..."
links.text: You're overwhelmed with a new surge of violent static. It feels like a blood vessel exploded in your brain.

links.title: You: ""What's happening to me?""
links.text: "What's happening to me?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm using a pale latitude compress..."
links.text: "I'm using a pale latitude compressor. You and your partner have been caught in its field."

links.title: Logic: "The explosion of static you're hear..."
links.text: The explosion of static you're hearing -- it's the ULAN frequency.

links.title: Logic: "Blasted from that pale emitter Fat..."
links.text: Blasted from that pale emitter Fat Angus mentioned.

links.title: You: ""I saw your equations... It's the U..."
links.text: "I saw your equations... It's the ULAN frequency!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""*Saw my equations*?" She snorts. "..."
links.text: "*Saw my equations*?" She snorts. "You've been sniffing through my lorry, right? I expected as much. I *am* a bit surprised you knew what you were looking at..."

links.title: You: ""Fat Angus said you had a pale emit..."
links.text: "Fat Angus said you had a pale emitter..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""That boy's really gotta learn to k..."
links.text: "That boy's really gotta learn to keep his trap shut. And it's not a bloody pale emitter. It doesn't emit *pale*..."

links.title: You: ""You're using one of those devices..."
links.text: "You're using one of those devices used to send signals through the pale on me!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Wow, check out the big brains on y..."
links.text: "Wow, check out the big brains on you." She sounds impressed. "You're not entirely wrong..."

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Try to cover your ears..."
links.text: Say nothing. Try to cover your ears.

links.title: Logic: "This must be the pale emitter Fat A..."
links.text: This must be the pale emitter Fat Angus mentioned.

links.title: Conceptualization: "I hate to interrupt the deafening p..."
links.text: I hate to interrupt the deafening pain you're in, but Joyce said it was possible to force dimensions by using radio waves. This must be one of the devices used to send radio signals across the pale.

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: ""Hhhhhzzzzzzzzssss... 136841... hhh..."
links.text: "Hhhhhzzzzzzzzssss... 136841... hhhhhzzzzzzzzzzssss... 37891303... hhhhhzzzzzzzsssss... hzzzzsssss..."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You should probably check on Kim. I..."
links.text: You should probably check on Kim. It doesn't sound like he's doing all too well.

links.title: You: "Look back at Kim."
links.text: Look back at Kim.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right behind you, officer." Eyes c..."
links.text: "Right behind you, officer." Eyes closed, the lieutenant is doubled over. He's still alive and breathing.

links.title: Endurance: "The torment Lieutenant Kitsuragi is..."
links.text: The torment Lieutenant Kitsuragi is experiencing is worse than your own, but he's slowly beginning to recover.

links.title: You: "Keep your eyes on Ruby."
links.text: Keep your eyes on Ruby.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""A pale latitude compressor is used..."
links.text: "A pale latitude compressor is used to sort of... make the pale more manageable. With a lot of these, you can force a radio signal grid on the pale -- literally crunch the distance across it."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Signals are relayed across a serie..."
links.text: "Signals are relayed across a series of repeater stations fixed to buoys." She pauses. "Not a fun job, manning those stations. All alone out there in the pale, people lose their minds in just a few years."

links.title: Empathy: "Sounds like she knew someone who us..."
links.text: Sounds like she knew someone who used to man one of those stations. But she won't tell you about her. Boy, you're one empathetic police officer to have guessed even that right now.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So, what we are experiencing is......"
links.text: "So, what we are experiencing is... a concentration of radio waves..." He gestures toward something with great effort.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Precisely. This is an industrial-s..."
links.text: "Precisely. This is an industrial-strength paraboloid. It's meant for forcing dimensions on something that doesn't *have* them. Needless to say, the frequencies used are... out of this world."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""At the upper limit is the large pr..."
links.text: "At the upper limit is the large prime number generator station. It's used specifically for pale latitude compression. That's why you may be hearing some numbers. But you might also hear -- or think you're hearing -- local radio chatter."

links.title: Logic: "This must be how the twins heard th..."
links.text: This must be how the twins heard the radio in their heads. They must have been standing by when she tested it.

links.title: Logic: "This must be how the twins heard th..."
links.text: This must be how the twins heard the radio in their heads. They must have been standing by when she tested it.

links.title: Suggestion: "She's been holed up in here for a w..."
links.text: She's been holed up in here for a while with no one to talk to. Keep her talking, and you just might get an opportunity to break loose.

links.title: Rhetoric: "She likes telling you about the mac..."
links.text: She likes telling you about the machine. Keep her talking, look for an opportunity to break loose.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You should probably check on Kim. T..."
links.text: You should probably check on Kim. That's what good partners do.

links.title: You: ""Are you gonna... kill me too?""
links.text: "Are you gonna... kill me too?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No, I'm not going to fucking kill..."
links.text: "No, I'm not going to fucking kill you. If that had been my plan, you'd be dead already. All things considered, I'm being pretty reasonable here."

links.title: You: ""Help, Kim, help! My brain's on fir..."
links.text: "Help, Kim, help! My brain's on fire!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mmm..." The lieutenant clutches hi..."
links.text: "Mmm..." The lieutenant clutches his head as his eyes roll back into his skull.

links.title: Endurance: "The torment Lieutenant Kitsuragi is..."
links.text: The torment Lieutenant Kitsuragi is experiencing is worse than your own. He's trying to resist, but there's no way of knowing when he will recover.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "As she says the word "officer," you..."
links.text: As she says the word "officer," you feel a spike in the agony. It sounds like the entire radio frequency range is screaming directly into your neural pathways.

dialogueTree.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "Suddenly, your entire body is paral..."
dialogueTree.text: Suddenly, your entire body is paralysed. Aggressive white noise fills your skull -- a strange pain like you've never felt before. The static overcomes you.

links.title: Game Over: "The darkness takes over as you feel..."
links.text: The darkness takes over as you feel yourself slipping into an unknown, mute state. Oh... it's death! This is the end.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""The pale? It's the end of the worl..."
links.text: "The pale? It's the end of the world."

links.title: You: ""What's this goddamned *pale* anywa..."
links.text: "What's this goddamned *pale* anyway?"

links.title: You: ""How did you get your hands on this..."
links.text: "How did you get your hands on this thing?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I built it myself." She nods towar..."
links.text: "I built it myself." She nods toward her torture device.

links.title: Interfacing: "And she's proud of it, too. As she..."
links.text: And she's proud of it, too. As she ought to. This is way beyond your abilities.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's illegal. I'm guessing it's..."
links.text: "That's illegal. I'm guessing it's patented... But we're beyond that, aren't we?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh yeah. *Way* beyond." She studie..."
links.text: "Oh yeah. *Way* beyond." She studies her death ray and the law officials trapped in it.

links.title: You: ""Will I stay like this forever?""
links.text: "Will I stay like this forever?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No -- once I shut down the compres..."
links.text: "No -- once I shut down the compressor, the pain will end." She hesitates. "It may take a few minutes for you to steady yourself, though -- it's a bit like waking out of a very confusing dream."

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: "Hzzzzzssssss... 342455797... Tere k..."
links.text: Hzzzzzssssss... 342455797... Tere kallis... Hzzzzzzzssss... Palun ära ole ometi nii pilves, ometi nii pilves mu tüdruk... Hzzzzzzssss... 4464544829... hzzzssss... hzzzzssss...

links.title: You: ""Have you... *experienced* the comp..."
links.text: "Have you... *experienced* the compressor yourself?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, I stuck my head in there bef..."
links.text: "Yeah, I stuck my head in there before using it on you. It seemed like the *ethical* thing to do. Can't say that I enjoyed it. The field was weaker, but I can imagine what you're going through."

links.title: You: ""This is all... great, but let's ta..."
links.text: "This is all... great, but let's talk... about the man who was killed."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, let's not talk about *that*..."
links.text: "Yeah, let's not talk about *that* shit. You were hunting me and fell into my trap instead. That's all there is to say about it."

links.title: Rhetoric: "So she thinks of you as hunters --..."
links.text: So she thinks of you as hunters -- not cops -- and of herself merely as prey.

links.title: You: ""Please, could you just turn it dow..."
links.text: "Please, could you just turn it down... so I can... ask you something?" (Move on.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""If you've got something *really* i..."
links.text: "If you've got something *really* important to say, you can do it through the white noise."

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: ""236189281... If you're looking for..."
links.text: "236189281... If you're looking for a deal on mattresses... SUHSUHSUHSPEEDFRRRR... 23567... 32971047302819... Oh Rosaline, oh Rosaline..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Damn... this..." The lieutenant cl..."
links.text: "Damn... this..." The lieutenant clutches his head, grimacing.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Goddamnit." She regards you and Ki..."
links.text: "Goddamnit." She regards you and Kim with sudden sympathy.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Fine, if you really want to talk,..."
links.text: "Fine, if you really want to talk, I can dial it down. I've also got a gun, by the way." She steps reluctantly out of the shadows. The pain lessens.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The gun she's carrying is a two-bar..."
links.text: The gun she's carrying is a two-barrelled front-loader -- not like the murder weapon.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Well, it doesn't *feel* much better..."
links.text: Well, it doesn't *feel* much better, but you can form sentences now. Thinking doesn't seem to hurt as much.

links.title: Suggestion: "Just keep her talking and you'll ge..."
links.text: Just keep her talking and you'll get through this.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "There's only three metres between y..."
links.text: There's only three metres between you and the machine. If you keep her distracted for long enough, maybe...

links.title: Empathy: "Be careful when you make your move..."
links.text: Be careful when you make your move -- that'll be *it* for questions. Bide your time.

links.title: You: ""Do you know something about the tr..."
links.text: "Do you know something about the tribunal... the mercenaries are planning?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She chuckles. "*Tribunal* is an awf..."
links.text: She chuckles. "*Tribunal* is an awfully fancy word for what they're going to do. But, yeah, I was listening to their frequency. They've finished their 'investigation.'"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Now they're going to put on a show..."
links.text: "Now they're going to put on a show before meting out punishment." She pauses, biting her lip. "Even though those assholes gave me up... I'm worried for the boys."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""And you -- watch out for yourselve..."
links.text: "And you -- watch out for yourselves. You seem to have a habit of walking into traps."

links.title: You: ""They're planning to set up a trap..."
links.text: "They're planning to set up a trap for us?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm guessing you don't know that a..."
links.text: "I'm guessing you don't know that a third mercenary has come to town just in time for the tribunal -- now you do."

links.title: Conceptualization: "If one hornet can kill 40 honeybees..."
links.text: If one hornet can kill 40 honeybees in a minute, then three hornets should be able to kill 120 honeybees in a minute... Or more, since they'll also be covering one another.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A third... Oh, this is bad.""
links.text: "A third... Oh, this is bad."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""As I said -- watch out." She nods."
links.text: "As I said -- watch out." She nods.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The pain is becoming unbearable now..."
links.text: The pain is becoming unbearable now.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Three mercenaries, no doubt armed t..."
links.text: Three mercenaries, no doubt armed to the teeth, hungry for vengeance... You've only got muzzle loaders. This isn't looking good.

links.title: You: ""Why is everyone always against me?""
links.text: "Why is everyone always against me?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm asking myself that right now t..."
links.text: "I'm asking myself that right now too. Anyway, I'm guessing you don't know that a third mercenary has come to town just in time for the tribunal -- now you do."

links.title: You: ""You said something about a tribuna..."
links.text: "You said something about a tribunal..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She sighs. "Yeah. The mercenaries a..."
links.text: She sighs. "Yeah. The mercenaries are about to set up a tribunal and execute someone for killing Lely."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How do you know this?""
links.text: "How do you know this?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I was listening in on their freque..."
links.text: "I was listening in on their frequency." She pauses, biting her lip. "Even though those assholes gave me up... I'm worried for the boys."

links.title: You: ""How did you know we were coming?""
links.text: "How did you know we were coming?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I heard you in the passages. And I..."
links.text: "I heard you in the passages. And I've been preparing for quite a while."

links.title: You: ""By hiding bullets under floorboard..."
links.text: "By hiding bullets under floorboards?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""So you found my shack, huh? I'm no..."
links.text: "So you found my shack, huh? I'm not surprised."

links.title: Empathy: "Her tone is bitter. She thinks she'..."
links.text: Her tone is bitter. She thinks she's been betrayed.

links.title: You: ""She didn't rat you out, by the way..."
links.text: "She didn't rat you out, by the way -- the washerwoman."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""So nice." She smiles a little smil..."
links.text: "So nice." She smiles a little smile. "That's one knife I didn't want to find in my back."

links.title: Rhetoric: "As opposed to the other knives she'..."
links.text: As opposed to the other knives she's finding there now. Hardie, for one.

links.title: You: ""Why... hide the bullet, though?""
links.text: "Why... hide the bullet, though?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""This could've turned out pretty ba..."
links.text: "This could've turned out pretty bad for me if you hadn't walked right into 25 bands of ultra-high frequencies."

links.title: Rhetoric: "That's her admitting the bullet was..."
links.text: That's her admitting the bullet was an emergency exit.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It was dark in the shack. The waves..."
links.text: It was dark in the shack. The waves outside had calmed down. She looked at the loaded gun, then she cracked the barrel open and took the bullet out. Not today.

links.title: You: ""Preparing for a... shoot-out? That..."
links.text: "Preparing for a... shoot-out? That why you're hiding ammo?

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I was. Before I caught you in the..."
links.text: "I was. Before I caught you in the pale latitude compressor. I'm fine now."

links.title: You: ""Preparing for the... worst?""
links.text: "Preparing for the... worst?"

links.title: You: ""You're... desperate, aren't you?""
links.text: "You're... desperate, aren't you?"

links.title: You: ""You don't need that...""
links.text: "You don't need that..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Not anymore, no. This could've tur..."
links.text: "Not anymore, no. This could've turned out pretty bad for me if you hadn't walked right into 25 bands of ultra-high frequencies."

links.title: You: ""Okay... then I have other question..."
links.text: "Okay... then I have other questions..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah? What?""
links.text: "Yeah? What?"

links.title: You: ""Did you shoot Lely?""
links.text: "Did you shoot Lely?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I don't think she did it... Sh..."
links.text: "No, I don't think she did it... She's someone else's case now."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "It's too late now anyway. She's gon..."
links.text: It's too late now anyway. She's gone.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No, I didn't do it. I only helped..."
links.text: "No, I didn't do it. I only helped stage the lynching. Though I doubt that makes much of a difference to *you*."

links.title: Authority: "So she says she didn't do it -- and..."
links.text: So she says she didn't do it -- and she doesn't trust you. Is it you specifically or the Citizens Militia that she distrusts?

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Who ratted me out, by the way? Was..."
links.text: "Who ratted me out, by the way? Was it Titus? No," she hesitates, "he wouldn't have broken first..."

links.title: You: ""Your friend Klaasje really threw y..."
links.text: "Your friend Klaasje really threw you to the wolves... said you shot Lely."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh." She smiles sadly. "I knew the..."
links.text: "Oh." She smiles sadly. "I knew the kitten had claws, but not like this..."

links.title: You: ""It didn't help her. She was a... f..."
links.text: "It didn't help her. She was a... fugitive. We took her in."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm sad to hear that. The girl was..."
links.text: "I'm sad to hear that. The girl was playing some dangerous games, but even with what she did to me... I wouldn't have wished *that* upon her."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She frowns. "She had some pretty me..."
links.text: She frowns. "She had some pretty messed up people after her. She's going to come out of that meat grinder a different person... If she comes out at all."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She'll age even faster in prison th..."
links.text: She'll age even faster in prison than she was partying. A pity.

links.title: Inland Empire: "There was a longing in her for some..."
links.text: There was a longing in her for some sort of denouement, but it's unlikely that it was this... turning prematurely grey while being escorted from interrogation room to interrogation room...

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""But Klaasje couldn't have known I..."
links.text: "But Klaasje couldn't have known I was here. How did you?"

links.title: You: ""We arrested her... consider yourse..."
links.text: "We arrested her... consider yourself avenged."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh, I wouldn't have wished that up..."
links.text: "Oh, I wouldn't have wished that upon her... The girl was playing some dangerous games, but even with what she did to me... I wouldn't have wished *that* upon her."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""But she couldn't have known I was..."
links.text: "But she couldn't have known I was on the coast. How did you find me?"

links.title: You: ""Your first guess wasn't entirely o..."
links.text: "Your first guess wasn't entirely off..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Titus and his boys, ma'am. They to..."
links.text: "Titus and his boys, ma'am. They told us you were on the coast."

links.title: Authority: "Even now, Kim is a paragon of profe..."
links.text: Even now, Kim is a paragon of professionalism: he's trying to make a clean cut of telling her she was betrayed.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She pauses, taking it in. "Well, fu..."
links.text: She pauses, taking it in. "Well, fuck. And those guys *liked* me -- I know it. If this is what happens to people whom people like..."

links.title: You: ""Your... own boys told us you were..."
links.text: "Your... own boys told us you were on the coast."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""*My* boys?""
links.text: "*My* boys?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, the ones you poached from Ti..."
links.text: "Yeah, the ones you poached from Titus. And Titus himself."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She looks at you incredulously. "Wh..."
links.text: She looks at you incredulously. "What is this? I thought Titus and I had a decent collegial relationship..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh, it doesn't even matter. How ca..."
links.text: "Oh, it doesn't even matter. How can they be *my* boys when they're not even my friends. And those guys *liked* me -- I know it. If this is what happens to people whom people like..."

links.title: You: ""Ruby boys... Formerly the Hardie b..."
links.text: "Ruby boys... Formerly the Hardie boys."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She looks at you incredulously. "Wh..."
links.text: She looks at you incredulously. "What? I don't even understand what you're trying to get at here."

links.title: You: ""Okay, call them the Hardie boys, t..."
links.text: "Okay, call them the Hardie boys, then."

links.title: You: ""Titus told me. It took some convin..."
links.text: "Titus told me. It took some convincing..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Aw, fuck. Took some convincing my..."
links.text: "Aw, fuck. Took some convincing my ass. And those guys *liked* me -- I know it. If this is what happens to people whom people like..."

links.title: Volition: "A dull despair is creeping into her..."
links.text: A dull despair is creeping into her voice.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""...how the fuck do the rest of you..."
links.text: "...how the fuck do the rest of you get by?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Does she mean that you're not a per..."
links.text: Does she mean that you're not a person whom other people like?

links.title: You: ""Wait, wasn't it... you who called..."
links.text: "Wait, wasn't it... you who called me the *human can opener*? It's not personal. I... opened them up."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I did, didn't I. And now you've co..."
links.text: "I did, didn't I. And now you've come for me." She scoffs. "But fuck them all the same."

links.title: Empathy: "That did make her forgive them -- a..."
links.text: That did make her forgive them -- a little.

links.title: You: ""I do it by... asking questions. An..."
links.text: "I do it by... asking questions. And I have some for you."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Like what?" She adjusts her grip o..."
links.text: "Like what?" She adjusts her grip on her gun. "I already told you I didn't do it."

links.title: Rhetoric: "A strong moral compass. She still w..."
links.text: A strong moral compass. She still wants the opportunity to make a case for herself.

links.title: You: ""Honestly, I don't know how I do it..."
links.text: "Honestly, I don't know how I do it... I just stumbled in here. Can you... please explain this shit to me?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""What shit?" She adjusts her grip o..."
links.text: "What shit?" She adjusts her grip on her gun. "I told you I didn't do it. Sounds pretty simple to me."

links.title: You: ""You're right. Klaasje was the firs..."
links.text: "You're right. Klaasje was the first... to share her suspicions."

links.title: You: ""When I threatened to arrest her, K..."
links.text: "When I threatened to arrest her, Klaasje broke... she told me everything."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh." She smiles sadly. "Well, I gu..."
links.text: "Oh." She smiles sadly. "Well, I guess I always knew she was a *survivor* above all else."

links.title: You: ""Klaasje. She's clearly a gender tr..."
links.text: "Klaasje. She's clearly a gender traitor."

links.title: You: ""It was your girlfriend. She cracke..."
links.text: "It was your girlfriend. She cracked."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She smiles bitterly. "Nah, she didn..."
links.text: She smiles bitterly. "Nah, she didn't crack. She's a survivor. If she told you anything, it was to save herself..."

links.title: You: ""Who killed the merc... if it wasn'..."
links.text: "Who killed the merc... if it wasn't you?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""How should I know? As I keep sayin..."
links.text: "How should I know? As I keep saying, he already had a bullet in his head when I got to him, and there hasn't been any useful gossip over the radio..."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Those rings around her eyes, her ti..."
links.text: Those rings around her eyes, her tired voice -- she's been staying up late listening in on the conversations criss-crossing Martinaise.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Police radio? You've been... follo..."
links.text: "Police radio? You've been... following the case?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Who hasn't?" She shrugs. "You know..."
links.text: "Who hasn't?" She shrugs. "You know, I can still see him there, in Klaasje's room, lying on his side."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""He was still warm, but the blueish..."
links.text: "He was still warm, but the blueish light coming through the broken window made him look as though he'd been dead for a good long while..."

links.title: Half Light: "Klaasje didn't want to turn the lam..."
links.text: Klaasje didn't want to turn the lamp on. She was afraid of another shot.

links.title: You: ""What happened... Sunday night? Tel..."
links.text: "What happened... Sunday night? Tell me your version."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She eyes you warily, as though gaug..."
links.text: She eyes you warily, as though gauging your sincerity.

links.title: Authority: "She's refusing to adopt the demeano..."
links.text: She's refusing to adopt the demeanour of a cornered animal. A leader with no one to lead -- she still wants to retain some control of the situation.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's okay... We just want to... hn..."
links.text: "It's okay... We just want to... hnghhhhh..." He struggles to finish the sentence.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Alright, don't kill yourself over..."
links.text: "Alright, don't kill yourself over it. I was shooting the shit with Hardie and the boys over a few beers, like always. Then Klaasje comes in, all pale and shuddering..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""She sits down with a drink, trying..."
links.text: "She sits down with a drink, trying to steady her nerves. So I grab a seat next to her."

links.title: You: ""Wait... did she also seem high to..."
links.text: "Wait... did she also seem high to you?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh yeah. *Super*. But I didn't thi..."
links.text: "Oh yeah. *Super*. But I didn't think too much of it at first -- I'd seen her party hard before."

links.title: Electrochemistry:"This woman has seen people O.D. Kla..."
links.text: This woman has seen people O.D. Klaasje wasn't quite there yet, so why worry?

links.title: You: ""Klaasje... said you knew something..."
links.text: "Klaasje... said you knew something was wrong immediately."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""No, I really didn't. She's not tha..."
links.text: "No, I really didn't. She's not that easy to read. I just assumed she'd done too much blow. It wouldn't be a first for her. But -- no such luck. She was in some *deep* shit."

links.title: You: ""And what did she say?""
links.text: "And what did she say?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""She asked me to come upstairs -- t..."
links.text: "She asked me to come upstairs -- the merc she'd been going with was lying on the bedroom floor, dead. I knew she couldn't get the authorities involved. So, yeah..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...you made it look... like he'd b..."
links.text: "...you made it look... like he'd been hanged..."

links.title: You: ""Klaasje said... you seemed to have..."
links.text: "Klaasje said... you seemed to have a plan... prepared when you got there."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""What? No. Faking a lynching was he..."
links.text: "What? No. Faking a lynching was her idea."

links.title: Half Light: "She looks shaken. She wasn't surpri..."
links.text: She looks shaken. She wasn't surprised to be ratted out -- but *framed*?

links.title: You: ""Her idea?""
links.text: "Her idea?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah. In cold blood. It really sur..."
links.text: "Yeah. In cold blood. It really surprised me -- how quickly she was able to get a hold of herself once we got up there. It was like she was another person. The *party girl* was gone."

links.title: Composure: "You can see it: her lips, though st..."
links.text: You can see it: her lips, though still white, don't seem to tremble as much anymore. She moves with focus and deliberation.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""She asked me to help her drag him..."
links.text: "She asked me to help her drag him into the shower so she could wind the shower head around his neck. To fake lividity. Then she dressed him while I went to get the Hardie boys."

links.title: Volition: "Klaasje knew exactly what she was d..."
links.text: Klaasje knew exactly what she was doing. You can't remain calm under pressure otherwise.

links.title: Drama: "She lied to you... about that *too*..."
links.text: She lied to you... about that *too*.

links.title: You: ""Shower head? Resourceful...""
links.text: "Shower head? Resourceful..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, I wasn't sure whether to adm..."
links.text: "Yeah, I wasn't sure whether to admire her -- or be disturbed."

links.title: You: ""Do you... think she might have kil..."
links.text: "Do you... think she might have killed the merc herself?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""And potentially bring attention to..."
links.text: "And potentially bring attention to herself? No. Besides, the shot was made from a distance -- otherwise we would have heard it downstairs."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But... even if this is true... " T..."
links.text: "But... even if this is true... " The lieutenant forces himself to finish the sentence: "Weren't you worried this 'lynching' might lead to..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""...war?" She purses her lips. "The..."
links.text: "...war?" She purses her lips. "The thought crossed my mind. But the mercenary's death was going to have repercussions either way. Although, the way things are going..."

links.title: Drama: "She doesn't want to talk about this..."
links.text: She doesn't want to talk about this, but not because she has something to hide -- she doesn't want the guilt.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Eh, fuck it." She shrugs. "I'm not..."
links.text: "Eh, fuck it." She shrugs. "I'm not responsible for these people after what they did to me."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Her grip on the gun is tight, her a..."
links.text: Her grip on the gun is tight, her arms toned -- her posture solid. Martinaise lost a valuable defender.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmgh... she's right. No one mentio..."
links.text: "Hmgh... she's right. No one mentioned *hearing*... shots. I... the shot didn't come from the roof."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "We should've factored this in. Damn..."
links.text: We should've factored this in. Damn it.

links.title: You: ""That's... bad -- that she'd be so..."
links.text: "That's... bad -- that she'd be so calm..."

links.title: You: ""I don't believe you!""
links.text: "I don't believe you!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I really don't care which one of u..."
links.text: "I really don't care which one of us you think was more at fault for the 'lynching.' Neither of us killed him, though."

links.title: You: ""How can you be sure... Klaasje did..."
links.text: "How can you be sure... Klaasje didn't kill him herself?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""The shot was made from a distance..."
links.text: "The shot was made from a distance -- otherwise we would have heard it downstairs. Besides, she had good reason to not draw attention to herself."

links.title: You: ""Klaasje found it... weird you came..."
links.text: "Klaasje found it... weird you came up with a plan so quickly."

links.title: You: ""How did you manage to... come up w..."
links.text: "How did you manage to... come up with a plan? So quickly?"

links.title: You: ""It's pretty weird... that you came..."
links.text: "It's pretty weird... that you came up with this plan right on the spot."

links.title: You: ""If you didn't kill him... why hide?""
links.text: "If you didn't kill him... why hide?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I saw *you* roll into town. I wasn..."
links.text: "I saw *you* roll into town. I wasn't about to stick around for questioning by a goddamn La Puta Madre agent."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "So this is what she was scared to t..."
links.text: So this is what she was scared to tell Titus. *This cop, this cop...*

links.title: Half Light: "That strange distant fear is gettin..."
links.text: That strange distant fear is getting close now. It's a fear -- of *yourself.*

links.title: You: ""What do you mean... La Puta Madre..."
links.text: "What do you mean... La Puta Madre agent?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yes -- you." She looks at you quiz..."
links.text: "Yes -- you." She looks at you quizzically. "Everyone says you're his peone. His 'Human Can Opener.'"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Through the sudden sharp pain in yo..."
links.text: Through the sudden sharp pain in your head, you hear the lieutenant mumble something to himself.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""Fucking hell" and "Why me?" you he..."
links.text: "Fucking hell" and "Why me?" you hear through the white noise.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "It's especially bad suddenly. Felt..."
links.text: It's especially bad suddenly. Felt like a vein exploded.

links.title: You: ""Who's 'everyone'? How do you know..."
links.text: "Who's 'everyone'? How do you know this?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Everyone in Jamrock. The cops, the..."
links.text: "Everyone in Jamrock. The cops, the criminals... Why do you think I'm holed up in here with a goddamn death ray, waiting for you?"

links.title: Logic: "If she knows *that* about you, she..."
links.text: If she knows *that* about you, she must know your real name too.

links.title: You: ""Tell me, what's my name? If you kn..."
links.text: "Tell me, what's my name? If you know... that about me, you must... know my name."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Harry Du Bois," she replies quickl..."
links.text: "Harry Du Bois," she replies quickly. "One corrupt motherfucker with the disco pants and the funny tie. Agent to La Puta Madre."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Did someone mention a fucked up tie..."
links.text: Did someone mention a fucked up tie? I call BULLSHIT. You're too CRAZY to be corrupt.

links.title: Volition: "So she knows your name. That doesn'..."
links.text: So she knows your name. That doesn't mean you're on the take. Criminals make up bogeyman stories about cops all the time.

links.title: Logic: "All of this just means that you're..."
links.text: All of this just means that you're effective. Criminals know you and are scared of you.

links.title: Half Light: "I don't know... sounds pretty convi..."
links.text: I don't know... sounds pretty convincing to me.

links.title: Volition: "Don't let her scare you. She probab..."
links.text: Don't let her scare you. She probably just made that name up on the spot.

links.title: Inland Empire: "No, no, it can't be that. You're no..."
links.text: No, no, it can't be that. You're not Harry Du Bois. Forget you heard any of this. There's no time to deal with this now.

links.title: You: ""Fuck yeah, I'm a La Puta Madre age..."
links.text: "Fuck yeah, I'm a La Puta Madre agent... You better let me go."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Nah. That I'm not planning to shoo..."
links.text: "Nah. That I'm not planning to shoot you is the extent of the courtesy I can extend to La Puta Madre at present."

links.title: Shivers: "A man in a white suit walks through..."
links.text: A man in a white suit walks through a garden coaxed from soil that had once been covered in asphalt -- a city block closed off from the rest of the city by dark buildings.

links.title: Shivers: "Rows and rows of poppies, most of w..."
links.text: Rows and rows of poppies, most of which have lost their pink bloom, flank his steps. The man looks around, then up at the sky; sighs.

links.title: Shivers: "Taking out a knife, he crouches at..."
links.text: Taking out a knife, he crouches at the end of one flower bed. He scores a seedpod, very gently. Milky sap begins to ooze out. The pain comes over you again...

links.title: You: ""What did you *do* to this... Madre..."
links.text: "What did you *do* to this... Madre anyway?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""You know what I did. I fucked him..."
links.text: "You know what I did. I fucked him over." She pauses. "And now I have Harry Can-Opener in my lair. Fucking Titus..."

links.title: Authority: "I thought we had an agreement, she..."
links.text: I thought we had an agreement, she thinks. *This* was not supposed to happen.

links.title: Suggestion: "She's not going to change her mind..."
links.text: She's not going to change her mind that easily. She still perceives you as a threat.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Wait, one thing. Possibly small but..."
links.text: Wait, one thing. Possibly small but -- she said *you* rolled into town. Was that 'you' singular or plural? She might know something...

links.title: You: ""Okay, other questions.""
links.text: "Okay, other questions."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah. Other questions.""
links.text: "Yeah. Other questions."

links.title: You: ""La Puta Madre... I've heard of La..."
links.text: "La Puta Madre... I've heard of La Puta Madre... He's dangerous... right?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Is that a joke or a threat? I'm gu..."
links.text: "Is that a joke or a threat? I'm guessing both."

links.title: You: ""No, that was a real question!""
links.text: "No, that was a real question!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah, sure.""
links.text: "Yeah, sure."

links.title: Drama: "She doesn't believe you."
links.text: She doesn't believe you.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry... I know I'm supposed t..."
links.text: "I'm sorry... I know I'm supposed to know all about... this, but I lost my memory recently..."

links.title: You: ""Yes, of course. Are you... *scared..."
links.text: "Yes, of course. Are you... *scared* yet?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Of you? No, not really.""
links.text: "Of you? No, not really."

links.title: You: ""I'm no one's... agent. I don't eve..."
links.text: "I'm no one's... agent. I don't even know who La Puta Madre is!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Right, sure. You don't know.""
links.text: "Right, sure. You don't know."

links.title: You: ""I'm sure I'm supposed to know... b..."
links.text: "I'm sure I'm supposed to know... but I lost my memory recently."

links.title: You: ""Could you... tell me about it?""
links.text: "Could you... tell me about it?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I'm sure La Puta Madre himself wil..."
links.text: "I'm sure La Puta Madre himself will explain it all to you soon enough."

links.title: You: ""Let's... talk about something else.""
links.text: "Let's... talk about something else."

links.title: You: ""Bullshit, you're trying to..." (wi..."
links.text: "Bullshit, you're trying to..." (wince grotesquely) "throw me off. No one says that."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh yes, they do. The cops, the cri..."
links.text: "Oh yes, they do. The cops, the criminals... Why do you think I'm holed up in here with a goddamn death ray, waiting for you?"

links.title: Half Light: "A fear fills you. A bad kind of fea..."
links.text: A fear fills you. A bad kind of fear. Of *yourself*.

links.title: You: ""When I came into town was there......"
links.text: "When I came into town was there... anyone with me?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Yeah. You had your death squad wit..."
links.text: "Yeah. You had your death squad with you. What happened to them, anyway?"

links.title: You: ""I don't... know what happened to t..."
links.text: "I don't... know what happened to them."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Sure you do, I bet they're just ou..."
links.text: "Sure you do, I bet they're just outside, waiting." She looks into the tunnel behind you. "I guess I'll take my chances."

links.title: Endurance: "She'll go out in a hail of bullets..."
links.text: She'll go out in a hail of bullets if she has to.

links.title: You: ""Who was in this... squad?""
links.text: "Who was in this... squad?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Well, it wasn't this scrawny dude...."
links.text: "Well, it wasn't this scrawny dude." She nods toward the lieutenant. "You had two guys and a lady. The guys looked pretty buff. Lady wasn't bad either."

links.title: You: ""What else can you... tell me...""
links.text: "What else can you... tell me..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""One of the guys seemed chipper, a..."
links.text: "One of the guys seemed chipper, a blond, the other had a brooding something-or-other about him... And the woman... the woman was the only one in uniform. All were carrying."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She narrows her eyes. "That sound a..."
links.text: She narrows her eyes. "That sound about right?"

links.title: Logic: "*No* idea who these people are. Lit..."
links.text: *No* idea who these people are. Literally.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Satellite-Officer Vicquemare looks..."
links.text: Satellite-Officer Vicquemare looks out of the window grimly, then puts his coffee down and turns to Patrol Officer Minot. "We can either take a room here in the Whirling or go home for today."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""Let's go home, Jean. Nothing's goi..."
links.text: "Let's go home, Jean. Nothing's going to happen today," she responds quietly. Jean takes his blond wig off. "Call Heidelstam. He can give us a ride."

links.title: You: ""I think I know them. They're in Ma..."
links.text: "I think I know them. They're in Martinaise..."

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: "Hhhhhhhhzzzzzzzzzzz.......... frict..."
links.text: Hhhhhhhhzzzzzzzzzzz.......... friction lock set.. Zzzzzzzzzzz... Don't leave me here, please Celice!

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Fantastic. I've gotta get on the r..."
links.text: "Fantastic. I've gotta get on the road -- then you can go find your friends... Unless you have anything *pressing* to ask me."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, that's right, I was just......"
links.text: "Yeah, that's right, I was just... testing you. They're right outside, with guns."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I've faced worse." She shrugs."
links.text: "I've faced worse." She shrugs.

links.title: Drama: "She hasn't. She hasn't gone up agai..."
links.text: She hasn't. She hasn't gone up against three armed people before. And she believed you.

links.title: You: ""No... that doesn't ring any bells.""
links.text: "No... that doesn't ring any bells."

links.title: You: ""That's all... thank you.""
links.text: "That's all... thank you."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Well, this has been a great talk,..."
links.text: "Well, this has been a great talk, really. But I think I'm going to hit the road now."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "She means it. You better make your..."
links.text: She means it. You better make your move soon.

links.title: You: ""Do you know about the... bunker......"
links.text: "Do you know about the... bunker... next door?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""What bunker?""
links.text: "What bunker?"

links.title: You: ""The communist hideout back there...""
links.text: "The communist hideout back there..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Don't know anything about it. No o..."
links.text: "Don't know anything about it. No one's been around since I set up camp. But I'm sure I'm not the first vagabond to..." Her voice trails off into white noise in your head. It feels like an aneurysm approaching.

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: "Hhhhhhhzzzzzzz... L'Iramburde: star..."
links.text: Hhhhhhhzzzzzzz... L'Iramburde: starbursts and sunshine. 24 degrees centigrade...

links.title: Endurance: "You've gotta act soon. This is gett..."
links.text: You've gotta act soon. This is getting *bad*.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Keep calm. Breathe in. After the pa..."
links.text: Keep calm. Breathe in. After the pain recedes it's a little clearer...

links.title: You: ""Just a... place some comrades stop..."
links.text: "Just a... place some comrades stopped through. A revolutionary bunker."

links.title: You: ""Just a bunker. Have you been there..."
links.text: "Just a bunker. Have you been there?!"

links.title: You: "Destroy the machine."
links.text: Destroy the machine.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You did it. The Compressor lies bro..."
links.text: You did it. The Compressor lies broken on its side. It's quiet in your head again. It still hurts like hell, but...

links.title: You: ""You're under arrest!""
links.text: "You're under arrest!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She looks at the machine, assessing..."
links.text: She looks at the machine, assessing the damage. Her hand trembles.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Ah, fuck it." She puts the barrel..."
links.text: "Ah, fuck it." She puts the barrel of the gun into her mouth.

links.title: You: ""What are you *doing*?""
links.text: "What are you *doing*?"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Problem-solving," she mutters."
links.text: "Problem-solving," she mutters.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ma'am, put the gun down. That's no..."
links.text: "Ma'am, put the gun down. That's not the solution to your problems. You are..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Oh, yes, it is.""
links.text: "Oh, yes, it is."

links.title: You: "Convince her to put the gun down."
links.text: Convince her to put the gun down.

links.title: Rhetoric: "She's truly desperate -- she thinks..."
links.text: She's truly desperate -- she thinks she has no other options. You need to give her options.

links.title: You: "What options?"
links.text: What options?

links.title: Rhetoric: "You know."
links.text: You know.

links.title: You: "Maybe I can still talk her out of i..."
links.text: Maybe I can still talk her out of it?

links.title: Rhetoric: "This *is* how you talk her out of i..."
links.text: This *is* how you talk her out of it. It's the only scenario in which she lives.

links.title: You: ""Please." (Put your hands up.) "Jus..."
links.text: "Please." (Put your hands up.) "Just walk away."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She stares at you, frozen, the gun..."
links.text: She stares at you, frozen, the gun still in her mouth, eyes filled with dark intensity. Then something shifts in her.

links.title: Empathy: "Gratitude. Doubt. She's still ready..."
links.text: Gratitude. Doubt. She's still ready to go...

links.title: Composure: "Her neck and shoulders relax, and h..."
links.text: Her neck and shoulders relax, and her grip on the gun loosens.

links.title: You: ""You don't have to do this. You're..."
links.text: "You don't have to do this. You're not cornered. I'm letting you go."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Day of miracles..." she says, pull..."
links.text: "Day of miracles..." she says, pulling the gun out of her mouth, eyes still fixed on you. Then she turns her gaze to the tunnel behind you. "I'll take it."

links.title: You: ""Just fucking go, okay, before I ch..."
links.text: "Just fucking go, okay, before I change my mind!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She runs past you, then past the li..."
links.text: She runs past you, then past the lieutenant, and disappears into the darkness of the tunnel.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good call..." The lieutenant is st..."
links.text: "Good call..." The lieutenant is still unsteady on his feet.

links.title: You: ""Are you sure?""
links.text: "Are you sure?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah, I'm sure..." He has to catch..."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm sure..." He has to catch his breath. "I would have done the same had I not been incapacitated..."

links.title: Authority: "He couldn't take it like you. It ir..."
links.text: He couldn't take it like you. It irks him -- then he gets over it.

links.title: You: ""What if we just let the murderer g..."
links.text: "What if we just let the murderer go?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have a feeling... we didn't." He..."
links.text: "I have a feeling... we didn't." He looks around, then points to the back of the cavern. "Her tent. We should check it out."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have a feeling... we didn't." He..."
links.text: "I have a feeling... we didn't." He looks around, then points to the back of the cavern. "Her tent. We should check it out."

links.title: You: ""I think she didn't do it.""
links.text: "I think she didn't do it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her tent. We should check it out."..."
links.text: "Her tent. We should check it out." He points to the back of the cavern.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her tent. We should check it out."..."
links.text: "Her tent. We should check it out." He points to the back of the cavern.

links.title: You: ""I think she did it. But... I didn'..."
links.text: "I think she did it. But... I didn't want her to die."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? That's... your takeaway? I..."
links.text: "Really? That's... your takeaway? I'm *certain* she didn't do it." He looks around, then points to the back of the cavern. "Her tent. We should check it out."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? That's... your takeaway? I..."
links.text: "Really? That's... your takeaway? I'm *certain* she didn't do it." He looks around, then points to the back of the cavern. "Her tent. We should check it out."

links.title: You: ""I did my best.""
links.text: "I did my best."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I would have done the same..." He..."
links.text: "I would have done the same..." He has to catch his breath. "Had I not been incapacitated..."

links.title: You: ""Thanks." (Rub your temples.)"
links.text: "Thanks." (Rub your temples.)

links.title: You: ""I wish I could just let you go, bu..."
links.text: "I wish I could just let you go, but I have to follow protocol."

links.title: Rhetoric: "You should know the words to say. Y..."
links.text: You should know the words to say. You've been here yourself. So why is it not coming to you?

links.title: You: ""Uhhm...""
links.text: "Uhhm..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Because you think suicide might be..."
links.text: Because you think suicide might be a good course of action for you too. Her finger squeezes the trigger now...

links.title: You: "But -- she doesn't deserve to die l..."
links.text: But -- she doesn't deserve to die like this!

links.title: Rhetoric: "No, wait, finally, it comes to you,..."
links.text: No, wait, finally, it comes to you, a way to connect with her:

links.title: You: ""I know your pain! I've been let do..."
links.text: "I know your pain! I've been let down by women too."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She flashes you an incredulous grin..."
links.text: She flashes you an incredulous grin. Then she exhales sharply, shakes her head, and pulls the trigger.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "A smirk crosses her face as she wat..."
links.text: A smirk crosses her face as she watches you stand there, mute. Then she exhales sharply, shakes her head, and pulls the trigger.

links.title: You: "I can't stop her..."
links.text: I can't stop her...

links.title: Rhetoric: "Because you've been going around po..."
links.text: Because you've been going around pointing a gun at yourself, trying to answer the same question in vain. Her finger squeezes the trigger now...

links.title: You: "I was drunk! I didn't mean it!..."
links.text: I was drunk! I didn't mean it!...

links.title: Rhetoric: "Because you've misread the situatio..."
links.text: Because you've misread the situation from the beginning. And now her finger squeezes the trigger...

links.title: You: "Come on, one idea, I need one idea!"
links.text: Come on, one idea, I need one idea!

links.title: You: "It's too late..."
links.text: It's too late...

links.title: You: "Why am I standing here like an idio..."
links.text: Why am I standing here like an idiot?

links.title: You: ""Go ahead, then." (Let her do it.)"
links.text: "Go ahead, then." (Let her do it.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "She pulls the trigger before you fi..."
links.text: She pulls the trigger before you finish your sentence.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "You watch as her brains trickle out..."
links.text: You watch as her brains trickle out through her neon hair.

links.title: You: ""Oh god...""
links.text: "Oh god..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck." The lieutenant stands, moti..."
links.text: "Fuck." The lieutenant stands, motionless, watching the blood pool in the sand.

links.title: Volition: "Get a hold of yourself. He needs yo..."
links.text: Get a hold of yourself. He needs your support now too.

links.title: You: ""What did we just do?""
links.text: "What did we just do?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Our job. It went really bad. And n..."
links.text: "Our job. It went really bad. And now we need to clean it up."

links.title: Empathy: "She died. How can he be so... cold?"
links.text: She died. How can he be so... cold?

links.title: Logic: "This is the right thing to do -- cl..."
links.text: This is the right thing to do -- clean up, keep a cool head.

links.title: You: ""She killed herself. I failed to ta..."
links.text: "She killed herself. I failed to talk to her down."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lieutenant-yefreitor Du Bois," he..."
links.text: "Lieutenant-yefreitor Du Bois," he intones. "Control your emotions. We did our *job*. This won't be the worst thing that happens on this case... believe me. You can't let this break you."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "There is no coming back from this o..."
links.text: There is no coming back from this one. It will stay with you -- in nightmares.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Detective*," he intones, "control..."
links.text: "*Detective*," he intones, "control your emotions. We did our *job*. This won't be the worst thing that happens to us on this case, believe me... You can't let this break you."

links.title: You: ""It's... it's our fault.""
links.text: "It's... it's our fault."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're cops. Everything is our faul..."
links.text: "We're cops. Everything is our fault, if we let it be..." He looks around.

links.title: Composure: "Despite his words, the lieutenant's..."
links.text: Despite his words, the lieutenant's barely keeping his composure; don't make it any harder.

links.title: You: ""I'm done. I'm not doing this anymo..."
links.text: "I'm done. I'm not doing this anymore." (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay... you said it. You needed to..."
links.text: "Okay... you said it. You needed to say it. Now it's been *said*," he says in a slow, measured voice. "We need to clean up."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You're going to need an ocean of bo..."
links.text: You're going to need an ocean of booze to drown this out.

links.title: You: ""No, I'm done. I'm not a cop anymor..."
links.text: "No, I'm done. I'm not a cop anymore." [End it.]

links.title: You: ""Okay. Okay." (Compose yourself.) "..."
links.text: "Okay. Okay." (Compose yourself.) "What do we do now?" (Move on.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We clean up." He looks around. "It..."
links.text: "We clean up." He looks around. "It may take days for processing to pick up her body. We need to move it somewhere..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He squints into the darkness, "that..."
links.text: He squints into the darkness, "that tent there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He squints into the darkness, "that..."
links.text: He squints into the darkness, "that tent there."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "If she kills herself you'll get her..."
links.text: If she kills herself you'll get her gun...

links.title: You: ""See them fireworks, Kim?" (Glance..."
links.text: "See them fireworks, Kim?" (Glance back.)

links.title: You: "(Whisper over your shoulder.) "You..."
links.text: (Whisper over your shoulder.) "You okay, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant hunches, recovering...."
links.text: The lieutenant hunches, recovering. "All good, officer. Be careful."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The violent white noise becomes eve..."
links.text: The violent white noise becomes even more overwhelming closer to the Compressor. Feels like your brain is swelling up in your skull.

links.title: You: "Squirm in pain."
links.text: Squirm in pain.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""I know it's bad -- try not to move.""
links.text: "I know it's bad -- try not to move."

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: ""875263... 23621837... for that spe..."
links.text: "875263... 23621837... for that special someone..."

links.title: You: ""Kim! Kim! Make it stop!""
links.text: "Kim! Kim! Make it stop!"

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Look, I know this isn't very fun f..."
links.text: "Look, I know this isn't very fun for you, so let's wrap this up. You have a tribunal to attend."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "She knows about the tribunal?"
links.text: She knows about the tribunal?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Tribunal? What tribunal?"
links.text: Tribunal? What tribunal?

links.title: You: "Just try not to collapse."
links.text: Just try not to collapse.

links.title: You: "Hold very still."
links.text: Hold very still.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""There, there, I told you it's best..."
links.text: "There, there, I told you it's best not to move."

links.title: You: "Hold still and try to have an apoca..."
links.text: Hold still and try to have an apocalyptic vision.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, are you okay?""
links.text: "Officer, are you okay?"

links.title: You: ""Don't worry, Kim, I'm just trying..."
links.text: "Don't worry, Kim, I'm just trying to... have... an apocalyptic... vision..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "The white noise turns into a wall o..."
links.text: The white noise turns into a wall of mist and grey mould, bubbling, sweeping over the city... it tears up buildings and raises sidewalks into the sky. It's Revachol -- at the end of the world.

links.title: Inland Empire: "...and it hasn't even really starte..."
links.text: ...and it hasn't even really started yet.

links.title: You: "What happens when it *really* start..."
links.text: What happens when it *really* starts?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Nothing. Just slow disappearance. Y..."
links.text: Nothing. Just slow disappearance. You look at a tree or a coal shed, then look away, and, turning back...

links.title: Inland Empire: "...the shed will be gone, and you w..."
links.text: ...the shed will be gone, and you won't even remember that the tree was ever there, much less what kind of tree it was, a pine or a birch. You won't remember if a man had been hanging from it.

links.title: You: "And then? The Unimaginable Event?"
links.text: And then? The Unimaginable Event?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes, but even in this anguish you c..."
links.text: Yes, but even in this anguish you can't see its precise shape. It's *unimaginable* for a reason.

links.title: You: "What will happen to *me*? (Try to c..."
links.text: What will happen to *me*? (Try to crawl back.)

links.title: Inland Empire: "The same thing that happens to all..."
links.text: The same thing that happens to all humans. You will become vapour. Dissolve into frequencies. Then those frequencies will be forgotten.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The visions compete for space in yo..."
links.text: The visions compete for space in your brain with the hailstorm of radio signals coming from the compressor. You feel like your skull is about to shatter into smithereens.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Fragments on bone scattering, like..."
links.text: Fragments on bone scattering, like your thoughts at this moment, sticking now to forebodings, now to a strangely familiar voice...

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: ""Yeah, we saw... 98713... hhhsssszz..."
links.text: "Yeah, we saw... 98713... hhhsssszzzz... completely lost his mind, or... hhhhhsssssszzzz... prenatal vitamins, because no child is a blank slate... 352628789... shameless asshole..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer... what are you doing, you..."
links.text: "Officer... what are you doing, you..."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Proximity to the Pale Compressor i..."
links.text: "Proximity to the Pale Compressor is overloading his mind. He'll be okay once it's off, though."

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: ""He didn't deign to stop to chat ....."
links.text: "He didn't deign to stop to chat ... 98713... hhhsssszzzz... completely lost his mind, or... hhhhhsssssszzzz... prenatal vitamins, because no child is a blank slate... 352628789... shameless asshole..."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The pain intensifies as your hands..."
links.text: The pain intensifies as your hands attempt to reach out into the pale chaos.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""What are you doing? I told you --..."
links.text: "What are you doing? I told you -- it's best not to move..."

links.title: You: ""I can't take it anymore. Just go."..."
links.text: "I can't take it anymore. Just go." (Don't attempt to destroy the compressor.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Glad to have been of assistance."..."
links.text: "Glad to have been of assistance." She tosses her head back defiantly and turns down the machine. "Best of luck to you, officers -- Revachol's a bitch."

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: "The woman runs past you and disappe..."
links.text: The woman runs past you and disappears into the darkness of the tunnel.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All things considered..." The lieu..."
links.text: "All things considered..." The lieutenant is still reeling from the pain. "...that could've gone worse."

links.title: You: ""Wait... shouldn't we go after her?""
links.text: "Wait... shouldn't we go after her?"

links.title: You: ""What now?" (Conclude.)"
links.text: "What now?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now we have to come up with a real..."
links.text: "Now we have to come up with a really good excuse... for why we walked right into a trap like that. This isn't going to look good in the report." He looks around, then points further into the cavern.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her tent! Maybe there's something..."
links.text: "Her tent! Maybe there's something in there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her tent! Maybe there's something..."
links.text: "Her tent! Maybe there's something in there."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "She's carrying a two-barrelled fron..."
links.text: She's carrying a two-barrelled front-loader. Remain careful.

links.title: You: ""*Please*, turn it off! I can't tak..."
links.text: "*Please*, turn it off! I can't take it anymore!" (Move on.)

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""You're big boys, you can handle it..."
links.text: "You're big boys, you can handle it. Stop being so damned melodramatic."

links.title: Pale Latitude Compressor: ""236189281... If you're looking for..."
links.text: "236189281... If you're looking for a deal on mattresses... SUHSUHSUHSPEEDFRRRR... 23567... 32971047302819... O' strange light, O' light of mine.."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Damn... this..." The lieutenant cl..."
links.text: "Damn... this..." The lieutenant clutches his head, grimacing.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Goddamnit." She regards you and Ki..."
links.text: "Goddamnit." She regards you and Kim with sudden sympathy.

links.title: Ruby, the Instigator: ""Fine. I can dial it down. I've als..."
links.text: "Fine. I can dial it down. I've also got a gun, by the way." She steps reluctantly out of the shadows. The pain lessens.
